Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the women in the photos were not protesting over the lack of men but were actually protesting against attacks on women wearing short skirts.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it uses unrelated images to support its argument.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the women in the photos were protesting because their husbands were spending too much time in bars, without providing any evidence for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the women in the photos were protesting against attacks on women wearing short skirts, as reported by international media.
